channel.title: Tor in the whonix-host
channel.description: Since I read the wiki indicating Tor-over-Tor in the whonix-workstation is dangerous, is it secure to install tor and tor browser bundle in the whonix-host instead? And if so, what is the traffic route in both host and workstation like? I assume in the host would be host -> tor -> server, and the workstation would be host -> tor -> tor -> server?

item.title: Tor in the whonix-host
item.dc:creator: nzhwtq
item.description:
And just to add some motivations to my question: my initial thought was inspired by the ongoing whonix-host development which is expected to torify the entire host. For now, ISP could see the host having un-tor traffics and the workstation having all-tor traffics at the same time. I guess thatâ€™s suspicious?
